entry.title: Viator craned to new site
entry.summary:
As part of the redevelopment Viator has been relocated to the other side of the lake.

http://www.standard.net.au/story/4731637/the-viator-rises-in-the-early-morning-photos-videos/#slide=1

Still no protection from the elements though :(
entry.content:
As part of the redevelopment Viator has been relocated to the other side of the lake.

http://www.standard.net.au/story/4731637/the-viator-rises-in-the-early-morning-photos-videos/#slide=1

Still no protection from the elements though :(

entry.title: Transom on Viator
entry.summary:
Continuing the slow restoration of Viator at Flagstaff Hill, the original transom had been covered with plywood and had rotted completely through.

The plank ends were so bad I ended up having to shortening the boat by 50mm in order to get a good fixing.
entry.content:
Continuing the slow restoration of Viator at Flagstaff Hill, the original transom had been covered with plywood and had rotted completely through.

The plank ends were so bad I ended up having to shortening the boat by 50mm in order to get a good fixing.
